abstract: Google, which last month announced a deal to buy online ad firm DoubleClick for $3.1 billion, said that while it has become more comfortable doing big acquisitions, it still sees small technology deals as its primary thrust for buying businesses.
lead_paragraph: Google, which last month announced a deal to buy online ad firm DoubleClick for $3.1 billion, said that while it has become more comfortable doing big acquisitions, it still sees small technology deals as its primary thrust for buying businesses.
